external_games.name: Gegege no Kitarou: Noroi no Nikuto Katachi Tachi
GeGeGe no Kitaro: Gyakushuu! Youma Daikessen

name: GeGeGe no Kitaro: Gyakushuu! Youma Daikessen
summary: GeGeGe no Kitaro is a comedy horror manga by Shigeru Mizuki, which was subsequently adapted into an eponymous anime series. The PSX game is based on the anime and is a 2D Platform game. The story is that Kitaro receives different missions to destroy some spirits that are disturbing different places and he got to defeat them.
